  • Method Details

    • mainMenu

      public static void mainMenu()
      Prints the main menu

    • inputValidation

      public static int inputValidation​(Scanner sc, int lowerBound, int upperBound)
      Used for validation of user's input when directing within the menus This method will keep asking user to give a input until the given input is valid.
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for input
      upperBound - of the valid input
      lowerBound - of the valid input
      Returns:
      the validated integer input

    • userLogin

      public static User userLogin​(ArrayList<User> users, Scanner sc)
      This methods check the user's input of user name and password and find the corresponding user in the system The input ArrayList users can be Admins, Professors, or Students. The method will keep asking user to give a correct user name and password combination
      Parameters:
      users - to check over
      sc - scanner
      Returns:
      the user file corresponding to the user's login info.

    • checkTime

      public static boolean checkTime​(Course course1, Course course2)
      This methods takes to courses in and check if there is a time conflict
      Parameters:
      course1 - to check
      course2 - to check
      Returns:
      true if conflict

    • isInList

      public static boolean isInList​(String toCheck, ArrayList<User> user, String check)
      This method checks if the given string is already in the list. This is mainly for checking ID and user name when admin is creating a new prof/student. Enter what do you want to check for the checking
      Parameters:
      toCheck - the string to be check if in the list
      user - an ArrayList containing all the user's information
      check - enter "ID" if want to check ID, and "username" if want to check "user name"
      Returns:
      true if in the list, or false if not

    • isInList

      public static boolean isInList​(String toCheck, ArrayList<Course> course)
      Method overloading for Course class. We only care ID in this case because only the course ID should be unique
      Parameters:
      toCheck - ID input
      course - an ArrayList containing all the course information
      Returns:
      true if the ID is already in the system

    • addStudent

      public static boolean addStudent​(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> stud, ArrayList<Course> course)
      This method takes input and add a new student into system based on the input
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner to get input
      stud - an ArrayList containing the student's information
      Returns:
      true if the new student is successfully added to the system.

    • addNewProf

      public static boolean addNewProf​(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> prof)
      This method adds a new professor to the management system. It will ask for informations about the new professor. This method will return true if the new professor is successfully added, and false if decided to return to the previous menu
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner to take input
      prof - ArrayList containing the information of all professors
      Returns:
      true if the new professor is successfully added to the system

    • addNewCourse

      public static boolean addNewCourse​(Scanner sc, ArrayList<Course> course, ArrayList<User> prof)
      This method adds a course based on admin's input information
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for admin input
      course - an ArrayList containing all the information for course
      prof - an ArrayList containing all the information for professors
      Returns:
      true if course is successfully added, false if admin want to quit

    • deleteCourse

      public static boolean deleteCourse​(Scanner sc, ArrayList<Course> course)
      This methods delete a course based on the user's input
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for user input
      course - an ArrayList containing the information of courses
      Returns:
      true if the course is successfully deleted

    • deleteUser

      public static boolean deleteUser​(Scanner sc, ArrayList<User> prof, String user)
      This method takes input and delete a user's profile from system based on the input
      Parameters:
      sc - Scanner for input
      prof - an ArrayList containing all the information of the users
      Returns:
      true if the user is successfully deleted from the system

    • main

      public static void main​(String[] args) throws FileNotFoundException
      Throws:
